summary: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser: Los que traen el infierno (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.
cast: Clare Higgins|Ashley Laurence|Kenneth Cranham|Imogen Boorman|Sean Chapman|William Hope|Doug Bradley|Barbie Wilde|Simon Bamford|Nicholas Vince|Oliver Smith|Angus MacInnes|Deborah Joel|James Tillitt|Bradley Lavelle|Edwin Craig|Ron Travis|Oliver Parker|Catherine Chevalier|Andrew Robinson|Robert Hines|Michael Cassidy|Anthony Allen|Grace Kirby|Kevin Cole
title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
